product_content:
FM12Q
                        12.1" Qualcomm Snapdragon™ 660 Android 車載電腦


重點特色

Qualcomm Snapdragon™ 660 八核, 2.2 GHz CPU
12.1” 1024 x 768 面板，帶投射式電容觸控螢幕
可現場更換的前面板，減少服務成本
IP65 防水和防塵
-30ºC 至 50ºC 廣泛的工作溫度範圍





CERTIFICATIONS


















產品規格書
下載資源















FM12Q
12.1" Qualcomm Snapdragon™ 660 Android 車載電腦




































產品資訊                                

技術規格                                

配件                                










防振和防震設計確保性能可靠
在工業用途方面，堅固耐用的融程FM12Q是必須的，可以在惡劣的環境中生存。其堅固的外殼通過MIL-STD-810H認證和IP65等級證明了FM12Q的耐用性。








投射電容觸控螢幕
FM12Q具有投射電容觸控螢幕的緊湊面板。防塵、防碎屑和高度敏感的觸控命令讓您享受使用設備的每一次觸控和便利。








高性能CPU
為了支持下一代物聯網邊緣設備，FM12Q開發了一系列針對物聯網增強的新處理器—Qualcomm Snapdragon™ 660系列處理器。這些處理器建立在新水平的CPU和圖形性能之上，具有集成的IoT功能、實時性能、可管理性、安全性和功能安全性。








在極端工作溫度下的可靠計算
工業電腦的低功耗組件可以防止過熱，並且不容易在第一時間達到高溫度。







顯示器








尺寸


12.1 inches




觸控種類


Projected Capacitive Multi Touch 




解析度


1024x768 




面版亮度


400 nits
800 nits(Optional) 




對比度


1000:1 




可視角


89,89,89,89 




觸控模式


Support Hand, Stylus, Glove Mode 




系統規格








處理器


Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 660 (Octa-Core 2.2 GHz) 




記憶體


3GB 




儲存空間


32GB 




作業系統


Android 9.0 




無線通訊網路


Support 




藍牙


Support 




無線廣域網路


4G/LTE (Optional) 




全球定位系統


GPS/GLONASS 




感測器


G-Sensor, Temp. Sensor 




鏡頭








前鏡頭


2MP Camera 




機構








外觀尺寸


Tablet: 307 x 225 x 41 mm
Docking: 202 x 245 x 52 mm 




底座外觀


Aluminum Alloy Housing 




重量


Tablet 1.7 kg
Docking 1.6 kg 




安裝


RAM Mount/ VESA Mount 




冷卻系統


Fanless Design 




訊號埠








USB埠


1 x USB 3.0 Type C (OTG)(Tablet)
1 x DB9 Connector for 2 x USB 2.0 Port(Docking) 




序列埠


2 x COM Port(Docking) 




有線網路


1 x Gigabit LAN port(Docking) 




音訊


2 x Speaker(Docking)
1 x CANBus or 1 x Audio(Docking) 




SD卡槽


1 x Micro SD Card Slot(Tablet) 




SIM卡槽


1 x Dual-Nano SIM Card Slot(Tablet) 




指示燈


3 x LED Indicator
(WLAN, UPS battery, Heater)
 




底座接頭


SMA Connector(female) for external antenna WLAN 
SMA Connector(female) for external antenna GPS (Optional)
SMA Connector(female) for external antenna WWAN (Optional) 




環境








工作濕度


5% to 95% RH, Non-Condensing 




工作溫度


-30°C to 60°C 




儲存溫度


-30°C to 60°C 




衝擊


MIL-STD-810H Method 516.8 Procedure I 




振動


MIL-STD-810H Method 514.8 Procedure I 




IP防水等級


IP65 




衝擊


Support EN62262 IK07 Rating 




靜電防護


Compliant with EN 61000-4-2,
Enhanced ESD to ±8kV Direct & ±15kV Air 




認證








認證


CE, FCC 




控制








按鈕


1 x Power Button, 5 x Function Button
(Programmable Function Key Configured by Winset) 




電源








電池


7.6V UPS Battery (2S1P)
Minimum 30 minutes 




電源規格


Docking: 10V-60V with ignition control 

Tablet: 12V DC In 




安全性








SOTI MobiControl


SOTI MobiControl Compliance 




配件








配件


5M Power Cable with Fuse Kit
0.3M USB Cable
0.15M Power Converter Cable
DC Jack Power Cable
84W Adapter with power cable
Cable Clamp Kit
Wi-Fi Antenna x 2
Quick Start Guide
External Antenna Fixing Bracket
Dock + Latch Locking Key
Stylus Kit + Screw 




配件選配


1.8M RS232 Cable
0.3M Audio Cable
1.8M CAN BUS Cable
1.8M CAN BUS Open Wire Cable
2M IP65 LAN Cable
GPS & LTE 2M Combo Antenna(VM240)
GPS & LTE 5M Combo Antenna (VM9C)
Magnetic Combo Antenna (VM10S)
WWAN Antenna
HDMI Adapter 





STANDARD ACCESSORIES


Clamp Kit






Model Name: CLA-FM
Part Number: 9B000000007G
Clamp Kit



USB cable






Model Name: USC
Part Number: 9483098080K0
0.3m D-Sub 9 USB connector on dock to two standard USB host connectors



Power convert cable






Model Name: PCC-FM
Part Number: 94J602G030K2
Terminal block to adapter convert cable



External Antenna Fixing Bracket






Model Name: EAB-FMD
Part Number: 88111T201203
Firmly fixing the position of external antenna



Fuse Kit






Model Name: FK-FMD
Part Number: 94JL01L01000
Fuse Kit



Wi-Fi Antenna






Model Name: WFA-FMD
Part Number: 397SM000000O
dual band Wi-Fi antenna – attached directly to dock



Stylus Kit + Screw






Model Name: SS-FM1
Part Number: 98K000A00076



Key for Vehicle dock






Model Name: KD-FMD
Part Number: 9B000000007N
To secure the device on the vehicle



Adapter






Model Name: EA10951C
Part Number: 922D084W12V1
84W Adapter with power cable



Power cable with Fuse






Model Name: PWC
Part Number: 94J008L040K1
5m DC Power cable straight connector



OPTIONAL ACCESSORIES


Magnetic Multi-Band Combo Antenna






Model Name: VM10S
Part Number: 397SM0000006
GPS & LTE  Combo ANTENNA



GPS & LTE MIMO Combo Antenna






Model Name: VM9C
Part Number: 397SM0000008
GPS & LTE MIMO Combo Antenna



GPS Antenna






Model Name: GSA-FM
Part Number: 397SM000000N
3M, GPS Antenna



HDMI Adapter






Model Name: TC-HDMI
Part Number: 9AN000000012
USB-C to 4K HDMI Adapter USB-C Cable: 5.5 in./14.5cm



CAN Bus Open Wire Cable






Model Name: CW-FMD
Part Number: 94E215L030K0
CAN Bus Open Wire Cable



WWAN Antenna






Model Name: WWA-FMD
Part Number: 397SM000000T
WWAN antenna for higher accuracy - attached to the dock



RS232 Cable






Model Name: RSC
Part Number: 94G4094090K1
1.8m standard 9-Pin male com port cable



CAN Bus Cable






Model Name: CC-FMD
Part Number: 94E2150090K0
1.8m This cable connect the D-Sub 15 dock connector to a standard CANbus connector. Audio and CANbus share the same connector on the dock.D-Sub 15 to 9 pin Female SAE J1939 and 9 pin Male SAE J1939	



LAN Cable






Model Name: LN-FMD
Part Number: 94I0080080KQ
2m IP65 LAN Cable



Audio Cable






Model Name: AC-FM
Part Number: 94E215R060K0
Dsub 15 pin to Audio out cable
